mapper.select: SELECT oa.id AS originTypeId, oa.type_name AS originTypeName, ta.id AS targetTypeId, ta.type_name AS targetTypeName FROM predict_account_type pa INNER JOIN user_info u ON u.account_id = pa.account_id AND u.login_name = #{loginName} INNER JOIN account_type oa ON oa.id = pa.origin_account_type_id INNER JOIN account_type ta ON ta.id = pa.target_account_type_id
mapper.update: UPDATE predict_account_type SET target_account_type_id = #{targetTypeId}, implement_date = #{implementDate} WHERE account_id = (SELECT account_id FROM user_info WHERE login_name = #{loginName})
